342689 is a loli being blackmailed into doing various stuff by her classmates. 203604 is guro again because, well I'm running out of things that aren't extreme to recommend, but luckily again, this one isn't that extreme as compared to others, so I hope you can enjoy it.

287683 is a bit more on the extreme side and I have read your other comment that said you didn't want something too extreme, but this one may be on the extreme side of things, it's guro, but it's very mild and hopefully not too extreme for you, it's lolis by the way. 168938 is the closest thing to this that is also not that extreme that I could find, it's about an idol loli getting raped using drugs. 221409 is an asanagi work and again I have read your other comment, but this ones is rather tame compared to his other works, and short too.

Yo I gotchu fam! 338882 is a great one, it's futa though so I don't know if you'll like it. 342597 is another good one, it's not futa and it's very short. 343041 in comparison is much longer though it's a collection of stories about lolis (and that one oppai loli, but that's shit anyway) being raped. 336575 is about average in length but it's shorter than this one, it's about lolis being raped (original i know) in a liveshow format and it doesn't have a lot in common with this series but it is incredibly hot and dark, well not that dark compared to others but still.
